name: Salamence
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: As a result of its long-held dream of flying, its cellular structure changes, and wings grew out.

attacks.name: Direct Hit
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dragon Finish
attacks.effect: Discard 2 basic {R} Energy cards or 2 basic {W} Energy cards attached to Salamence. If you discarded 2 basic {R} Energy cards, this attack does 100 damage to the Defending Pokémon. If you discarded 2 Basic {W} Energy cards, this attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (If you can’t discard cards, this attack does nothing.)
